titles.title: Hallucinogen Control Act of 2002
To amend the Controlled Substances Act to place Salvinorin A in Schedule I.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 10/10/2002--Introduced. Hallucinogen Control Act of 2002 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to add any material, compound, mixture, or preparation which contains salvinorin A or salvia divinorum to Schedule I (drugs or other substances with a high potential for abuse, with no currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States, and with respect to which there is a lack of accepted safety for use under medical supervision) unless specifically exempted or listed in another schedule.
